column5: Koh Kong province was privileged to host the Khmer Kite Festival .------The Khmer Kite Competition is organized in 23 provinces / cities and 47 kite kites teams participated. The program is aimed at maintaining the tradition of kite flying as an integral part of national culture.------Wining provinces were; Takeo was ranked No. 1
